subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: After losing the first set, Roger Federer sharpened his focus and ground strokes and defeated Richard Gasquet, 2-6, 6-3, 6-2, in the Rogers Cup.
snippet: After losing the first set, Roger Federer sharpened his focus and ground strokes and defeated Richard Gasquet, 2-6, 6-3, 6-2, in the Rogers Cup.
